group_1.textLeft: It wasn't just Mizuna that turned its back@on me, but my hometown as well...
It feels like resentment is always bubbling@beneath the surface, about to erupt.

group_1.textRight: You'll never get anywhere by resenting@the people living here.
Kamihama is a large city, undergoing rapid@expansion.
Even now, its history is dug deep.
Rather than bear grudges against its people,@you should resent the city's history.

group_1.textLeft: But people are the ones who put words@and actions out into the world.
It's impossible not to feel bitter toward@them.

group_1.textRight: Look at the root cause of it all.
They're simply being guided by the city's@history.
They absorb it and it's like it's always@been a part of them.
It's only natural they would lose their@sense of individuality.
So try not to bear them ill will...

group_1.narration: I'm sorry, Kanagi.@That doesn't make me feel any different.
Whether in Mizuna or Daito,@even if people are just being @swayed by Kamihama's history...
I'm not so levelheaded that@I can simply accept that.

group_1.textCenter: I hate all of them, every single person!
Why did I have to take all that abuse, just@because I came from Daito?!
What did I even do to deserve it?!
All I did was try my hardest at schoolwork@and sports! And I did well!
I didn't do anything to make all of them@hate me so much!
So why couldn't they stand me?! What was it?
Did I do something to deserve being pushed@down the stairs?!
And then they tell me to go drop out!
YOU'RE the ones who had high hopes!
You pinned all your expectations on ME!
You made all that fuss about me being the@first big prodigy of Daito!
And when I come back, I'M the disgrace?@I'm the sellout?!
And then they dare bring my sister into this!
If it's this city's history that's at fault,@then to hell with the city and its history!

group_1.textRight: So what is it exactly that you want?

group_1.textLeft: What in the world are you?

group_1.textRight: I can grant you any wish your heart desires.
Though, in return, you'll have to become@a Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle* Oh dear. I'm so angry I may@have gone mad...

group_1.textRight: I assure you, Mitama Yakumo, you are sane.
Tell me your wish, and you'll see how@clearly your mind is working.

group_1.textLeft: Well, I suppose it can't hurt to try.
So I can wish for whatever I like?
Very well. Then my wish is...

group_1.narration: [textRed:"I want to be the one to destroy Kamihama."]
